text:
"God Is a Woman" (written in sentence case) is a song by American singer Ariana Grande, from her fourth studio album, "Sweetener" (2018). The song was released on July 13, 2018, as the second single from the album, after "No Tears Left to Cry". The song discusses the theme of God as a female.
American singer Madonna is featured as the voice of God in the music video for the song.
The song reached the top five of the charts in the UK, Canada, Ireland, New Zealand, and Australia and reached the top ten in the US.
